text: (pōrukku cellāmal am muṉāḥpikkukaḷ tam vīṭukaḷil) amarntu koṇṭē (pōril maṭinta) tam cakōtararkaḷaip paṟṟi; "avarkaḷ eṅkaḷaip piṉpaṟṟiyiruntāl kollappaṭṭirukka māṭṭārkaḷ" eṉṟu kūṟukiṟārkaḷ; (napiyē!) Nīr kūṟum; "nīṅkaḷ (colvatil) uṇmaiyāḷarkaḷāṉāl uṅkaḷai maraṉam aṇukāvaṇṇam taṭuttu viṭuṅkaḷ" (pārppōm eṉṟu)
